info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 17 at 2:51PM MST until September 17 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Tucson AZ
info.description:
* WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...West central Pima.
* WHEN...Until 445 PM MST.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry washes.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 250 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause arroyo and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Growler Wash, Pia Oik Wash, Alamo Wash, Gu Vo Wash, San Simon Wash, Vamori Wash, Kuakatch Wash, Chukut Kuk Wash, Siovi Shuatak Wash and Ali Chuk Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... GuVo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument and Pia Oik. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON
